Automate your sales over WhatsApp and receive payments 24/7.

Boost your revenues with conversational sales

Increase sales

Increase both engagement and effectiveness by reaching your customers where they are.

Reduce costs

Handle more customers' request with less resources by automating repetitive tasks.

Increase customer satisfaction

Reduce customer friction by providing and always- on service.

Streamline your helpdesk

With automated FAQs, your reps con now focus on high-value conversations and tasks.

Our flasghip product is an intelligent agent that helps businesses engage with their customers and sell tickets over WhatsApp. The agent is able to automate the whole ticketing process and accept mobile money payments.

Autonomous Ticketing

The autonomous agent can connect to our backend to automate tickets' purchases and mobile money payment processings. We provide you with a dashboard to keep track of your tickets sales. We also provide analytics and an easy way to send promotions or marketing content to your customers.

Automated FAQs

The agent responds to your active customers even when your customer care agents are all on break. It monitors all incoming requests from WhatsApp and attend to custmers's enquiries in real-time, 24/7.
